titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Office of the Secretary, Yale University, Records Removed for Anti-Trust Investigation
Office of the Secretary, Yale University, Records Removed for Anti-Trust Investigation
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday September 28, 2018 at 10:36

did.unittitle: Office of the Secretary, Yale University, records removed for anti-trust investigation

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of Yale University Corporation meeting minutes.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 1-A (YRG 1-A), Minutes of meetings and administrative records of the Yale Corporation.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Office of the Secretary, 1995.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of the Secretary, Yale University, Records Removed for Anti-Trust Investigation (RU 163). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of Yale University Corporation meeting minutes.
